name: 32 Minutes How to Save a Newspaper with Charles Foster Kane
name_original: 32 Minutes How to Save a Newspaper with Charles Foster Kane
description:
Save the New York Daily Inquirer with Charles Foster Kane!

By Ellen Cunningham

A short comedic puzzle adventure game made with Unity and Fungus.

Part of a larger project in which a bunch of talented developers recreate 'Citizen Kane'... in game form.

Inspired by a scene 32 mins in.

Check out the rest of 'The Citizen Kane of Video Games' at:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/7050/Teaching/...
